body: Can you please try to update `lodash` to the latest version as explain [here](https://github.com/cloudinary/cloudinary_npm/issues/183)?

still the same,

Can you please try adding cloudinary-core or @cloudinary/angular-5.x and let us know if that helps?
If that doesn't help can you try `npm install stream --save`

Closing this issue due to the time elapsed. Please feel free to either re-open the issue, contact our support at http://support.cloudinary.com or create a new ticket if you have any additional issues.
